readme:
# MHCC Code Academy Atom Package

[This Atom package](https://atom.io/packages/mhcc-code-academy) is used to install *other* pacakges we'll be using in the [MHCC Code Academy](http://codeacademymhcc.github.io) class. Doing it this way because the computers get scrubbed every day and installing the packages over and over again one at a time is a pain. 

Down the road this approach could lend itself to distributing tutorials directly to the students' editors and other niceties.

Packages we're installing:

- [color-picker](https://atom.io/packages/color-picker)
- [pigments](https://atom.io/packages/pigments)
- [emmet](https://atom.io/packages/emmet)
- [local-server-express](https://atom.io/packages/local-server-express)
